title: Oleksandr Bezimov
text:
Oleksandr Bezimov (; born 8 February 1984 in <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>) is a <a href="Ukrainians">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Zaria%20B%C4%83l%C8%9Bi">FC Zaria Bălți</a> in the <a href="Moldovan%20National%20Division">Moldovan National Division</a>.
Bezimov played in the different Russian and Moldovan football clubs. In February 2014 he signed a contract with <a href="FC%20Olimpia%20B%C4%83l%C8%9Bi">FC Olimpia Bălți</a>.
